name: createDevice
description: This method manually creates a new device. This is not supported by all device families or for all devices. createDevice can be used to create virtual devices in the family "Miscellaneous".
signatures: Integer createDevice(Integer familyId, Integer deviceType, String serialNumber, Integer address, Integer firmwareVersion, String interfaceId)

parameters.name: familyId
parameters.description: ID of the family to create the device in. See: listFamilies.

parameters.name: deviceType
parameters.description: The type id of the device as specified in the device's XML file.

parameters.name: serialNumber
parameters.description: The serial number of the new device.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The physical address of the new device. Depending on the device family this parameter might be optional. If not needed, set to "-1".

parameters.name: firmwareVersion
parameters.description: The firmware version of the new device. Depending on the device family this parameter might be optional. If the firmware version is "1.2" set this variable to 0x12 = 18. If not needed, set to "-1".

parameters.name: interfaceId
parameters.description: The id of the interface as defined in the family configuration file to associate the newly created device to.

returnValue: Returns the id of the new device on success.

errors.description: Device family is unknown or unavailable.
Device with this serial number or address already exists.
Method not implemented by the device family.
